text: "What a Wonderful World" is a song written by Bob Thiele and George David Weiss. It was first recorded by Louis Armstrong and released in 1967 as a single. After appearing in the movie Good Morning, Vietnam, the song was re- released as a single in 1988. Armstrong's recording was added in the Grammy Hall of Fame in 1999. ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Anne Murray songs Category:Louis Armstrong songs Category:Eva Cassidy songs Category:Katie Melua songs Category:Nick Cave songs
title: What a Wonderful World
